overview:
Charles Haggas co-founded Space Chimp Media in 2008. He graduated from the prestigious Rollins College with B.A.S in International Business. As an internet marketing business generalist, Charles focuses his expertise on helping web businesses through SEO, e-commerce consulting, pay per click, social media marketing, and business best practice consulting.

Charles entered the world of internet marketing not unlike many others. After a time of managing his own eCommerce stores he eventually decided he wanted to use his knowledge and secrets he had learned to help others.

After a period of working for other companies in which he directly generated millions of dollars in revenue, Charles decided it was time to step out on his own once again and thus started Space Chimp Media.

Specialties: Online Marketing, eCommerce Management, SEO, Social Media, PPC, Branding, eCommerce Consulting, Web Devlopment, Web Development, Product Marketing.
